articles.description: Manchester United are in talks about appointing Sporting coach Ruben Amorim as  Erik ten Hag's replacement.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Manchester United in talks over Erik ten Hag successor

articles.description: Manchester City and Spain midfielder Rodri wins the men's Ballon d'Or - awarded to the best footballer of the year - for the first time.
articles.title: Ballon d'Or 2024: Manchester City and Spain midfielder Rodri wins first award

articles.description: With Manchester United calling time on Erik ten Hag's reign as manager, Simon Stone looks back at yet another troubled period for the club.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag sacking: Inside a turbulent two years at Manchester United

articles.description: Lando Norris likes Max Verstappen as a person. So Norris was trying not to criticise the Dutchman too much after the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Mexico City GP: Max Verstappen 'got what he had coming to him'

articles.description: Spain and Barcelona midfielder Aitana Bonmati wins the Women's Ballon d'Or for the second year in a row.
articles.title: Women's Ballon d'Or 2024: Aitana Bonmati wins award for second successive year

articles.description: As Manchester United search for a new manager, BBC Sport pundits discuss what the club need to do to improve their fortunes.
articles.title: Next Man Utd manager: How do you fix Old Trafford club after Erik ten Hag sacking?

articles.description: Jayden Daniels' dramatic Hail Mary helps Washington sink Chicago, while the Cleveland Browns cause a huge upset but nobody seems able to beat Kansas City.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week 8 recap: Jayden Daniels' Hail Mary, Browns upset Ravens & Chiefs still unbeaten

articles.description: Harry Kane and Kylian Mbappe win the Ballon d'Or's Gerd Muller award for scoring the most goals in Europe.
articles.title: Ballon d'Or 2024: Harry Kane and Kylian Mbappe share top scorer award

articles.description: Comedian and BBC cricket statistician Andy Zaltzman looks at the statistics behind Pakistan's remarkable comeback against England to win the Test series.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Andy Zaltzman on the statistics behind hosts' remarkable comeback series win

articles.description: Marco Penge needing a birdie on the 18th hole to keep alive hopes of retaining his DP World Tour card is what makes the sport worth watching, writes Iain Carter
articles.title: 'My body was shaking' - a five-foot putt to keep your job
